cmp: 丰 (buxom/good-looking/appearance and carriage of a person, (surname)/abundant/plentiful/great)

exm.mng: Zhang Guotao (1897-1979), Chinese communist leader in the 1920s and 1930s, defected to Guomindang in 1938
Guo Songdao or Kuo Sun-tao (1818-1891), China's first imperial commissioner (ambassador) to UK and France
